``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column .col-v-center width="15%"} ::: ::: {.column .col-v-center width="70%"} ## Hotel Information {#hotel} ::: {.panel-tabset} ## Philadelphia Marriott Downtown The 2023 AP-LS Conference will be held at the [Philadelphia Marriott Downtown](https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/phldt-philadelphia-marriott-downtown/overview/?scid=8e4624f4-e96a-4d68-b772-59df755b5c65&gclsrc=ds) > 1201 Market Street
> Philadelphia, PA, USA, 19107 > *guest entrance at 1200 Filbert Street* ## Conference Rates Book a room through the AP-LS sponsored link for conference discount \$209 USD per night\* Rate not inclusive of final taxes/fees [{{< fa bell-concierge >}} Book a room](%22https://book.passkey.com/gt/218524854?gtid=ebf7480702a2b34d863a79c09cb5f074%22){.btn-action .btn .btn-primary role="button"} ::: ## Register to Attend {#register} Registration is now open! Early Bird registration rates available on or before January 31, 2023. Additional pricing information listed below. [{{< fa user-plus >}} Register Now]("https://apls.memberclicks.net/2023_conf_registration"){.btn-action .btn .btn-primary role="button"} ```{=html}

``` ## Program & Schedule {#program} {{< downloadthis docs/2023_Conference_Grid-Updated.pdf dname="2023_Conference_Grid-Updated" label="Download Program" icon="file-pdf" type="primary" >}} ## Promotional Opportunities {#sponsors} {{< downloadthis docs/AP-LS_Prospectus_2023.pdf dname="AP-LS_Prospectus_2023" label="Exhibitor Prospectus" icon="download" type="primary" >}} ::: {.panel-tabset} ## Become an AP-LS Sponsor Signing up as a Business Partner of AP-LS has never been easier. Select your sponsorship, upload your logo, register your staff and make a payment all in one place. [Click here to register!](https://apls.memberclicks.net/2023_sponsor_exhibitor_form) ## Take-One Brochure Table \$200 (One time fee) For the benefit of those who do not, or cannot, rent a booth exhibit, a Take-One Brochure Table for the distribution of free brochures and other material is available to offer pamphlets, brochures, leaflets, cards, magazines, etc. This will be for paid Take-One Exhibitors ONLY. Other materials will be removed. Unused materials will not be returned. ## Branding opportunities All targeted sponsorship opportunities come with acknowledgment at the conference. \*Cost production not included in sponsorship - Tote Bags - \$2,000 - Lanyards - \$2,000 - Wireless Mobile Device Charger - \$3,500 - USB Drive - \$2,500 - Key Card - \$9,500 - Keycard Holder Multi-page Pocket Schedule - \$10,500 - Bag Insert - \$250 - Scholarships - \$3,000 - Mobile App Push Notifications - \$500 ## Sponsorship opportunities All targeted sponsorship opportunities support the individual items or events selected. Each opportunity is exclusive, so your organization will be featured prominently at each event. - **Conference Wi-Fi Sponsor -** \$8,000 - **Welcome Reception Sponsor -** \$8,000 - **Thursday Breaks (AM/PM) -** \$3,500 - **Lunch Product Theatre (2 available - Fri or Sat) -** \$15,000 (Lunch not included in pricing - **Poster Session Reception (2 available - Fri or Sat) -** \$10,000 - **Friday Breaks (AM/PM) -** \$3,500 - **Saturday Breaks (AM/PM) -** \$2,000 ::: ::: ::: {.simple-info} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/sponsors-1.png){width=200} ::: ::: :::
